other_tests.findings: Normal results, demonstrating no evidence of slowing.
Severe gastroesophageal reflux and a small (2×2 cm) gastric pouch but no other abnormalities.
Demonstrated severe (2 mm) stenosis of the surgical anastomosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After dilation of the stenosis, Mr. A's nausea and vomiting resolved, and his oral intake rapidly improved within 1–2 days.
